m_szDocTitle: Virtual reality, connected cars, Snapchat are poised to explode - Chicago Tribune
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Virtual reality, connected cars, Snapchat are poised to explode APphoto_Virtual Reality Expo John Locher, AP A woman at January's Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas tries out the Galaxy Gear VR headset at the Samsung booth.  A woman at January's Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas tries out the Galaxy Gear VR headset at the Samsung booth.  (John Locher, AP) Privacy Policy Virtual reality, connected cars, e-sports, the on-demand economy — all are becoming important elements in the economy, and all are poised for rapid growth in 2016 — along with some chal
